titles.title: CB 195 He is able - He is able

properties.copyright: Â©1958 New Spring (Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing, Inc.)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
He is able - He is able
I know my Lord is able
I know my Lord is able
to carry me through (repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He healed the broken-hearted
He set the captives free
He made the lame to walk again
And He caused the blind to see.
(repeat first verse)
